Package CAMs

Interface EnquirySuggestionHandler

public interface EnquirySuggestionHandler
Defines the contract for handling the submission, viewing, editing, and deletion of enquiries and suggestions by a student.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(CAMs.Query query, CAMs.Student student)
    Deletes an existing enquiry or suggestion submitted by a student.
    void
    edit(CAMs.Query oldQuery, String newEnquiryText, CAMs.Student student)
    Edits the content of an existing enquiry or suggestion submitted by a student.
    void
    submit(CAMs.Camp camp, CAMs.Query query, CAMs.Student student)
    Submits an enquiry or suggestion to a specific camp on behalf of a student.
    void
    view(CAMs.Student student)
    Displays the enquiries and suggestions submitted by a student.

  • Method Details

    • submit

      void submit(CAMs.Camp camp, CAMs.Query query, CAMs.Student student)
      Submits an enquiry or suggestion to a specific camp on behalf of a student.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to which the enquiry or suggestion is submitted.
      query - The enquiry or suggestion to be submitted.
      student - The student submitting the enquiry or suggestion.

    • view

      void view(CAMs.Student student)
      Displays the enquiries and suggestions submitted by a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student for whom the enquiries and suggestions are displayed.

    • edit

      void edit(CAMs.Query oldQuery, String newEnquiryText, CAMs.Student student)
      Edits the content of an existing enquiry or suggestion submitted by a student.
      Parameters:
      oldQuery - The original enquiry or suggestion to be edited.
      newEnquiryText - The new text for the enquiry or suggestion.
      student - The student who submitted the original enquiry or suggestion.

    • delete

      void delete(CAMs.Query query, CAMs.Student student)
      Deletes an existing enquiry or suggestion submitted by a student.
      Parameters:
      query - The enquiry or suggestion to be deleted.
      student - The student who submitted the enquiry or suggestion.
